sentences.en: 'The man's a perfect trump ,'declared the squire.
sentences.cn: “ 这个人很可靠.”乡绅说.

sentences.en: By wearing a simple but stunning dress, she had trumped them all.
sentences.cn: 她穿了一条简单却惊艳的裙子，力压群芳。

sentences.en: Conrad came up trumps again, finishing fourth in the 800 metres.
sentences.cn: 康拉德又一次超常发挥，在800米赛跑中取得第四名。

sentences.en: Customer goals should never trump end goals but need to be considered within the overall design.
sentences.cn: 顾客目标始终不应该超越最终目标,但需要在整体设计中考虑.

sentences.en: He played a trump.
sentences.cn: 他吊主。

sentences.en: He was never able to trump up the courage to have a showdown.
sentences.cn: 他始终鼓不起勇气摊牌.

sentences.en: Hearts are trumps.
sentences.cn: 红桃是王牌。

sentences.en: I had to play a trump to win the trick.
sentences.cn: 我只好打出王牌才赢得这一墩.

sentences.en: I played a trump and won the trick.
sentences.cn: 我打出一张主牌，赢了那一墩。

sentences.en: If you are out to condemn sb ., you can always trump up a charge.
sentences.cn: 欲加之罪, 何患无词.

sentences.en: In the end, the Ten took their appeal to the Supreme Court; this, they had believed from the outset, would be their trump card.
sentences.cn: 最后,10个人上诉到最高法院：他们从一开始就认为这一招是他们的王牌。

sentences.en: Jo pronounced her a " trump ".
sentences.cn: 裘称她是个 “ 慷慨大度者 ”.

sentences.en: Marla was recently seen slinging her shoes at Trump.
sentences.cn: 最近有人看见马拉朝特朗普扔鞋子。

sentences.en: She played a trump.
sentences.cn: 她打出了王牌.

sentences.en: She was never able to trump up the courage to have a showdown.
sentences.cn: 她始终鼓不起勇气摊牌.

sentences.en: Sylvia does not get on with the supervisor and the danger is that he will trump up some charge to discredit her.
sentences.cn: 西尔维亚与主管人相处得不好,因而害怕他会捏造一些罪名使她名誉扫地.

sentences.en: They've linked her with various men, including magnate Donald Trump.
sentences.cn: 他们把她与不同的男人扯上关系，包括大亨唐纳德·特朗普。

sentences.en: they've trumped up charges against her.
sentences.cn: 他们捏造事实指控她。

sentences.en: This lad Hawkins is a trump, I perceive.
sentences.cn: 我看霍金斯这孩子也是好样的.

sentences.en: trumped up a charge of conspiracy.
sentences.cn: 诬陷（某人）反叛

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式，主英)（人的表现、情况等）比预计好
唐纳德·特朗普（美国地产大亨）

trans.tran_cn: 王牌，法宝，有效手段，<古，诗>喇叭，号声，<口>好人
trans.tran_en: the  suit (= one of the four types of cards in a set )  chosen to have a higher value than the other suits in a particular card game
to do better than someone else in a situation when people are competing with each other

trans.tran_cn: 出王牌，捏造，编造，吹喇叭
